title: 56th Algiers International Economic Fair to showcase global opportunities
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 01 (APP):The Algerian Company of Fairs and Exports (SAFEX) is set to host the 56th Edition of the International Economic Fair of Algiers (FIA) from June 23rd to 28th, 2025, at the Exhibition Center in Pins Maritimes, Algiers.
This premier event serves as a platform for economic, cultural, and technological exchanges, offering opportunities for investment and partnership in strategic sectors, information shared by Algerian Embassy in Islamabad.
The fair attracts a wide range of economic leaders and influential players, providing a framework for forging new relationships, consolidating existing partnerships, and exploring new opportunities for economic cooperation.
The Algerian Embassy invites Pakistani businesses to participate in this significant event to promote bilateral cooperation between Algeria and Pakistan.
The Embassy of Algeria hopes that Pakistan will participate with a large delegation, building on last yearâ€™s successful participation, to strengthen economic ties between the two countries.
